about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME

A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor.
The story continues with Nikki accepting an invitation from her friend Sienna to go out drinking in a club, only to end up fucked in the restroom by the blonde's cocky boyfriend.

Will Adam enjoy another cuckold experience?
Follow their Sex Story and find out!

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Nikki & Adam, and embark on their journey of spicing up their marital life in a brand new and wild cuckold Sex Story.

EPISODE 6
A relaxing night at home is about to turn wild when Nikki receives a text from her good friend Sienna. It’s an invitation to join the sexy blonde and her new boyfriend for drinks in a club downtown.
Typically for the slutty wife, she puts on a skimpy outfit and teases her husband with promises of finding a willing partner to get naughty with before leaving him hard as a rock and walking out the door.

Her plan of making Adam a cuckold almost goes sideways when she finds the Club devoid of other party people. But luckily for Nikki, her sexy friend comes up with a naughty proposal of her own.

Will Adam enjoy another cuckold experience?
Follow their Sex Story and find out!

content_descriptors.notes: The game graphically depicts sex in still images among male/female characters.
